mapper.update: update SQL_METADATA set SQL_TYPE = #{sqlType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNED_BY = #{ownedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PUBLISHED_FLG = #{publishedFlg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETED_FLG = #{deletedFlg,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, SQL_TYPE, NAME, DESCRIPTION, OWNED_BY, PUBLISHED_FLG, UPDATED_AT, CREATED_AT, DELETED_FLG from SQL_METADATA where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select ID, SQL_TYPE, NAME, DESCRIPTION, OWNED_BY, PUBLISHED_FLG, UPDATED_AT, CREATED_AT, DELETED_FLG from SQL_METADATA
